name: XP-Pen Artist Pro 16 Gen 2
description: 16-inch pen display with X3 Pro smart chip stylus for ultra-low latency. Features fully laminated display, 16K pressure levels, and excellent value for aspiring artists.

reviews.review_text: Best value pen display. Quality rivals Wacom.
X3 stylus latency is impressively low.
Software not as polished as Wacom.
